title: naravara raghunandana
sahitya:
naravara raghunandana shrInAtha amara pAlana


anupallavi

  smarahara sannutanAma smarajanaka sArvabhauma


caraNam    puruSOttama bhUsurAdi suragaNa sEvita pada susvara gAnAnanda
caraNAgata janArtihara sharadi mada vidara shrI varada venkaTEshvara shrIkara khalasamhAra
